description: This file appears to be a header file (.h) defining a C++ class 'RemotePlugin' inside nested namespaces WPEFramework::Plugin::Rust. It declares the class, its constructors, methods, interface maps, and private members, indicating it is part of a plugin architecture for the WPEFramework. The class interacts with other components via interface pointers and handles plugin lifecycle, communication, and process management.

classes.name: RemotePlugin
classes.description: A plugin class that provides lifecycle management, communication, and process control for a Rust-based remote plugin within the WPEFramework, implementing various plugin interfaces.

methods.name: RemotePlugin
methods.description: Constructor initializing the RemotePlugin with a given configuration.

methods.name: ~RemotePlugin
methods.description: Default destructor for RemotePlugin.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the provided shell interface.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin, performing cleanup.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns information about the plugin.

methods.name: AddRef
methods.description: Increments reference count for interface management.

methods.name: Release
methods.description: Decrements reference count for interface management.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the plugin with the given shell context (version conditional).

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the plugin (version conditional).

methods.name: Attach
methods.description: Attaches a communication channel.

methods.name: Detach
methods.description: Detaches a communication channel.

methods.name: Close
methods.description: Closes a communication channel (version conditional).

methods.name: Revoke
methods.description: Revokes a callback resource (version conditional).

methods.name: Validate
methods.description: Validates a request with token, method, and parameters (version conditional).

methods.name: Invoke
methods.description: Invokes a remote call, either with callback and channel ID or with JSONRPC context and message.

methods.name: Inbound
methods.description: Processes an inbound message identified by string or ID with associated JSON element.

methods.name: onRead
methods.description: Processes a response received from the remote.

methods.name: LaunchRemoteProcess
methods.description: Starts a remote process with specified shared library, host IP, and port.

methods.name: SendTo
methods.description: Sends JSON data to a specified channel ID.
